steps.title: Draw a few basic shapes to start.
steps.content: Draw a few basic shapes to start. Sketch the head using a large circle and within that draw another to serve as the snout. Add circular facial guidelines to help you with features in subsequent steps.

steps.title: Draw two round-cornered triangles for the ears and another smaller set of triangles inside that.
steps.content: Draw two round-cornered triangles for the ears and another smaller set of triangles inside that. Draw a diamond shape for the nose and an inverted "Y" shape for the mouth. Add in two small circles for the eyes. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Draw three ovals as guides for the body.
steps.content: Draw three ovals as guides for the body. Draw a small one for the neck and two large ones for the body.

steps.title: Add in three large ovals for each leg.
steps.content: Add in three large ovals for each leg. Put a small circle for each foot, with small ovals for the paws.

steps.title: Add in two lines for the tail.
steps.content: Add in two lines for the tail. They should be thicker at the base, tapering off to a slightly rounded end.

steps.title: Sketch in the details.
steps.content: Sketch in the details. Add fur, whiskers, and claws. Don't forget the tiger's trademark stripes!

steps.title: Outline the image and color it in!
steps.content: Outline the image and color it in! Make sure all excess guidelines are erased, and use mostly orange/brown with darker stripes for the body.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the main section of the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the main section of the head. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Draw an inverted triangle with two lines at both sides for the nose.
steps.content: Draw an inverted triangle with two lines at both sides for the nose. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Draw two circles for the upper mouth.
steps.content: Draw two circles for the upper mouth.

steps.title: Draw a series of ovals for the lower mouth and ears.
steps.content: Draw a series of ovals for the lower mouth and ears.

steps.title: Draw curves on both sides of the head of your tiger.
steps.content: Draw curves on both sides of the head of your tiger.

steps.title: Draw the eyes with circles attached to curved triangles.
steps.content: Draw the eyes with circles attached to curved triangles.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw the tiger head(make the jagged lines when drawing the tiger to make it look like fur).
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw the tiger head(make the jagged lines when drawing the tiger to make it look like fur).
